title: Wrong ranked border .\ _ /. !!!
body: After the patch my platinum borders were changed to gold V, but I have plat border in the game lobby, OPGG also shows that i'm platinum in s8. IT LOOKS SUCKS{{champion:161}}

replies.body: It's a known issue with accounts whose highest rank was bumped up from Div 5 to 4 with the release of the new tiers. Should be fixed next patch, I believe they deemed the ranked downtime it would take to fix it now not worthwhile for what is essentially a cosmetic bug.
